ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
Food and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Relating to Access to Restricted Drugs
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS RELATING TO ACCESS TO RESTRICTED DRUGS in order to prevent "restricted drugs", heroin and unauthorized products containing cocaine from being sold through Health Canada's Special Access Programme.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0172 Publication Date: 2013-10-23
